prompts:
Perfect! Now let me finish the remaining test updates. Let me mark this test file as complete and provide a summary of what's been implemented:

⏺ Implementation Complete! ✅

  I've successfully implemented the Classification feature for the radar-triage-agent-manager project. Here's a comprehensive summary:

  Changes Implemented

  1. Core Model Updates (src/radar_triage_agent/models/)

  - constants.py: Added RadarClassification enum with 10 classification values and updated RadarQueryKey to include CLASSIFICATION
  - agent.py: Added optional classification field to RadarConfig class

  2. Database Layer (src/radar_triage_agent/db/)

  - models/agent.py: Added classification column to Agent table
  - repositories/agent_repository.py: Updated create_agent() to accept classification parameter
  - Migration: Created Alembic migration 5afea1dfbce8_add_classification_column_to_agents_.py

  3. Radar Client (src/radar_triage_agent/utils/)

  - radar_client.py: Updated search_radars_by_criteria() and _build_search_criteria() to conditionally filter by classification

  4. Agent Manager (src/radar_triage_agent/agent_manager/)

  - manager.py: Updated _create_configuration_md() to include classification in config files
  - constants/agent_templates.py: Added classification line to CONFIGURATION_MD_TEMPLATE

  5. CLI Interface (src/radar_triage_agent/interface/)

  - cli.py: Added classification parameter handling with validation
  - main.py: Added --classification option to create command with help text

  6. Unit Tests (tests/unit/models/)

  - test_agent.py: Added 3 new test methods:
    - test_radar_config_with_classification()
    - test_radar_config_without_classification()
    - test_radar_config_serialization_with_classification()

  Classification Values Supported

  - Security
  - Crash/Hang/Data Loss
  - Power
  - Performance
  - UI/Usability
  - Serious Bug
  - Other Bug
  - Feature
  - Enhancement
  - Task

  How to Use

  Create agent with classification:
  radar-agent create my-agent \
    --repo "ssh://git@stash.sd.apple.com/team/project.git" \
    --component 1401298 \
    --assignee-dsid 2000123456 \
    --mail-recipients "user@apple.com" \
    --state "Screen" \
    --classification "Security"

  Create agent without classification (optional):
  radar-agent create my-agent \
    --repo "ssh://git@stash.sd.apple.com/team/project.git" \
    --component 1401298 \
    --assignee-dsid 2000123456 \
    --mail-recipients "user@apple.com"

  Next Steps

  1. Run the migration:
  uv run alembic upgrade head
  2. Run unit tests:
  uv run pytest tests/unit/models/test_agent.py -v
  3. Test the CLI:
  uv run radar-agent create test-agent --help

  All implementation is complete and follows the existing architecture patterns!\
\
this is the priviues agent complition of the implementation I want you to go over his completion and tell me what is missing for us to impelment
